name: Nexuspad
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
NEXUSPAD PROTOCOL is a multi-utilities launchpad including staking V2 and farming V2 features. 
The launchpad also implements forecast mechanics which allows the engagement and participation of the broader, less economically fortunate, more beneficial to the investors. Also it  introduces the NEXUS token which serves as the essence of launchpad to be required to protect against malicious attacks, governance, and participation in project allocations
